title: The Big Apple
description:
Kirk is recording from Pod Room 1 at HQ before the big trivia match. Rico Bosco, Big Cat & Jeff D Lowe join. The guys talk about Big Cat's move to Chicago and whether Rico will join them. Big Cat proclaims that he was also used by Chris Klemmer. Kirk is planning a live show before The Dozen Live in Boston.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
